name: clippy
description: Video downloader application using NestJS and Angular

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:electron && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:prod: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron .
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-builder build --publish never
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.package:win: npm run build && electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && electron-builder build --linux --publish never
